description.fr: Terrine maison de sanglier et cerf, accompagnée de compotée d'oignons et pain brioché toasté

description.en: Perfectly roasted venison steak, cranberry sauce, truffle celeriac purée and seasonal vegetables

description.en: Wild boar stew braised in red wine, served with homemade spätzle and forest mushrooms

description.en: Roasted duck breast with sweet spices, honey and orange jus, truffle oil crushed potatoes

description.fr: Bar entier grillé, beurre blanc au champagne, légumes primeurs et pommes grenailles rôties
description.en: Whole grilled sea bass, champagne butter sauce, spring vegetables and roasted fingerling potatoes

name.fr: Tarte Fine aux Poires et Caramel

description.en: Thin tart with caramelized pears, almond cream and salted butter caramel ice cream
